Question: Senbiosys CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Senbiosys

Product: VELIA ring (formerly known as Iris)

- VELIA ring to be introduced at CES 2024
- Selected as a CES® 2024 Innovation Awards Honoree
- Features cutting-edge design and engineering
- Set to mark a new era in wearable tech
- Incorporates high fidelity PPG sensing technology
- Custom IC for health-aware earbuds
- User-specific wearable device experience
- Low power consumption and robust operation
- Measures raw PPG signals with high precision
- Integration of advanced CMOS image sensor pixel design
- Operation in various modes reducing need for additional components
Summary_cn:
森比奥斯

产品：VELIA戒指（原名为Iris）

- VELIA戒指将在2024年的CES展会上推出
- 被选为CES® 2024创新奖得奖者
- 具有尖端设计和工程技术
- 将标志着可穿戴技术的新时代
- 融入了高保真PPG传感技术
- 针对可穿戴设备的健康意识耳机进行了定制IC
- 用户特定的可穿戴设备体验
- 低功耗和稳健的运行
- 以高精度测量原始PPG信号
- 集成了先进的CMOS图像传感器像素设计
- 在各种模式下运行，减少对额外元件的需求
